message: I propose a 60-40 split in my favor. This seems fair considering the uncertainty of future rounds and inflation effects.

Given the significant impact of inflation on my share, now at 27% less than the first round, I propose a 60-40 split in my favor. This adjustment is necessary to counteract the diminishing value of money for me in future rounds.
